about_the_game:
ULTIMATE CHICKEN PATH is a Free to Play horror based on the popular game "Five Nights at Freddy's" (FNaF).
In ULTIMATE CHICKEN PATH you play as a child
who is lost in an entertainment complex.
Run away from monsters,
solve puzzles, use your logic to survive
and escape from this place.
You don't have a weapon. Run, hide or die.

Waking up in a cold office, where do you look first?
Run away, hide, look for items to survive.
The main antagonist is Chica the Chicken, who will not miss the chance to catch you.
Try to escape and tell everyone the truth about this place.

More about:


In "ULTIMATE CHICKEN PATH", you play as a child who has gone missing in an entertainment complex. There is no staff around, as the complex has been closed for the night. However, the park is not completely empty. It is infested with terrifying robots that are after the child. The child has no weapons, but must rely on their wits to solve puzzles, hide, and run to escape the robots and find the way to safety. Will you be able to navigate the park's twists and turns to uncover the ultimate chicken path? Play now to find out!

From the developer:



Meet the favorite characters from one popular game!
This is a non-commercial product that takes place in an alternate universe, but very similar to the original.
The time is the same as in the original world. And not only time.
Time, people, events, buildings, cities and much more.
However, in this world Pizzaplex is a chain of complexes.
And the actions do not take place in what is in the original.
These buildings are connected by an underground tunnels, so all those who can harm you were able to find you.

name: ULTIMATE CHICKEN PATH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600XT
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 or Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: ULTIMATE CHICKEN PATH is a Free to Play horror based on the popular game "Five Nights at Freddy's". Waking up in a cold office, where do you look first? You're a random kid who went missing in entertainment complex. Try to escape and tell everyone the truth about this place.
